headline.print_headline: Liverpool Have an Advantage in Title Race, Says Mourinho
headline.main: Liverpool Have an Advantage in Title Race, Says Mourinho

docs.snippet: Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho believes Liverpool have an advantage in the Premier League title race because they will not be distracted by the Champions League....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho believes Liverpool have an advantage in the Premier League title race because they will not be distracted by the Champions League.

headline.print_headline: Cost-Cutting Lions Release Receiver Burleson, Safety Delmas
headline.main: Cost-Cutting Lions Release Receiver Burleson, Safety Delmas

docs.snippet: The Detroit Lions took a big bite out of their salary cap by releasing veteran wide receiver Nate Burleson and safety Louis Delmas, the National Football League team said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Detroit Lions took a big bite out of their salary cap by releasing veteran wide receiver Nate Burleson and safety Louis Delmas, the National Football League team said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Group Overseeing Data Processor Agrees to Nasdaq's Fixes: Source
headline.main: Group Overseeing Data Processor Agrees to Nasdaq's Fixes: Source

docs.snippet: The committee that oversees the data processor that was at the center of a three-hour trading halt in Nasdaq-listed stocks in August agreed on Thursday to implement fixes demanded by the exchange, according to a source familiar with the situation....
docs.lead_paragraph: The committee that oversees the data processor that was at the center of a three-hour trading halt in Nasdaq-listed stocks in August agreed on Thursday to implement fixes demanded by the exchange, according to a source familiar with the situation.

headline.print_headline: More Obamacare Insurers in Louisiana Reject AIDS Patients
headline.main: More Obamacare Insurers in Louisiana Reject AIDS Patients

docs.snippet: The only three insurance companies in Louisiana that sell healthcare policies under President Barack Obama's healthcare law throughout the state are rejecting payments from a federal program intended to help low-income HIV patients, advocacy group...
docs.lead_paragraph: The only three insurance companies in Louisiana that sell healthcare policies under President Barack Obama's healthcare law throughout the state are rejecting payments from a federal program intended to help low-income HIV patients, advocacy groups said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Fairfax Financial Reports Fourth-Quarter Loss on Hedges
headline.main: Fairfax Financial Reports Fourth-Quarter Loss on Hedges

docs.snippet: Fairfax Financial Corp, the Canadian property and casualty insurer run by veteran investor Prem Watsa, said on Thursday it had a loss in the fourth quarter, as its equity hedges lost money in a strong market....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fairfax Financial Corp, the Canadian property and casualty insurer run by veteran investor Prem Watsa, said on Thursday it had a loss in the fourth quarter, as its equity hedges lost money in a strong market.

headline.sub: ,Americans ski, sled and dig themselves out after heavy snowfall
headline.main: ,Americans ski, sled and dig themselves out after heavy snowfall

docs.snippet: A massive snow storm dumps a foot of snow on the East Coast, transforming Washington into a winter wonderland and slowing the frenetic pace of New York's Times Square. Deborah Gembara reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: A massive snow storm dumps a foot of snow on the East Coast, transforming Washington into a winter wonderland and slowing the frenetic pace of New York's Times Square. Deborah Gembara reports.

headline.print_headline: Rooney Can Take World Cup by Storm, Says England Manager
headline.main: Rooney Can Take World Cup by Storm, Says England Manager

docs.snippet: Manchester United striker Wayne Rooney can be one of the outstanding talents of this year's World Cup in Brazil, according to England manager Roy Hodgson....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manchester United striker Wayne Rooney can be one of the outstanding talents of this year's World Cup in Brazil, according to England manager Roy Hodgson.
